Uses of Package
de.lessvoid.nifty.types

  • Packages that use de.lessvoid.nifty.types 
    Package Description
    de.lessvoid.nifty
    Provides the public classes for Nifty representing the public Nifty API.
    de.lessvoid.nifty.node
    Standard NiftyNodes
    de.lessvoid.nifty.spi
    The Nifty Service Provider Interface (SPI) Package.
    de.lessvoid.nifty.spi.node  
    de.lessvoid.nifty.types  
  • Classes in de.lessvoid.nifty.types used by de.lessvoid.nifty 
    Class and Description
    NiftyColor
    Immutable Color representation for Nifty.
    NiftyCompositeOperation
    Composite operations Nifty supports.
    NiftyLinearGradient
    A linear gradient between with a given angle that contains a number of color stops.
    NiftyLineCapType
    LineCapType - the type of the line cap.
    NiftyLineJoinType
    LineJoinType - the type of the line join.
    NiftyRect
    A rectangle marking a area at a specific location.
    NiftySize
    A size in 2D-Space defined by a width and a height value.
  • Classes in de.lessvoid.nifty.types used by de.lessvoid.nifty.node 
    Class and Description
    NiftyColor
    Immutable Color representation for Nifty.
    NiftyDock
    These enumeration is used to define at what border in a DockLayoutNode the DockLayoutChildNode is attached to.
    NiftyPoint
    A point in 2D-Space defined by a X and a Y coordinate.
    NiftySize
    A size in 2D-Space defined by a width and a height value.
  • Classes in de.lessvoid.nifty.types used by de.lessvoid.nifty.spi 
    Class and Description
    NiftyColor
    Immutable Color representation for Nifty.
    NiftyColorStop
    A NiftyColorStop contains a stop value between 0.0 and 1.0 and a NiftyColor and is used by the NiftyGradients.
    NiftyCompositeOperation
    Composite operations Nifty supports.
    NiftyLineCapType
    LineCapType - the type of the line cap.
    NiftyLineJoinType
    LineJoinType - the type of the line join.

    Class and Description
    NiftyColor
    Immutable Color representation for Nifty.
    NiftyColorStop
    A NiftyColorStop contains a stop value between 0.0 and 1.0 and a NiftyColor and is used by the NiftyGradients.
    NiftyCompositeOperation
    Composite operations Nifty supports.
    NiftyDock
    These enumeration is used to define at what border in a DockLayoutNode the DockLayoutChildNode is attached to.
    NiftyLinearGradient
    A linear gradient between with a given angle that contains a number of color stops.
    NiftyLineCapType
    LineCapType - the type of the line cap.
    NiftyLineJoinType
    LineJoinType - the type of the line join.
    NiftyMutableColor
    A Mutable color implementation used when colors will need to be animated.
    NiftyPoint
    A point in 2D-Space defined by a X and a Y coordinate.
    NiftyRect
    A rectangle marking a area at a specific location.
